author: Daniel Michaels
title: What’s at Stake in Tariff War: WTO’s Future - WSJ
text:
BRUSSELS—President Donald Trump’s unilateral imposition of new tariffs last week is a slap at the World Trade Organization, a frequent target of his attacks. Allies are urging Mr. Trump to fix the 164-country body, not marginalize it.
The WTO’s future is particularly uncertain because the Trump administration’s approach simultaneously circumvents and relies on it.

On...
